text: The 1998 World Junior Figure Skating Championships were held in Saint John, New Brunswick, Canada between November 30 and December 7, 1997. Younger figure skaters competed for the title of World Junior Champion. ==Medals table== ==Results== ===Men=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Rank ! Name !
